title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. VII, pt. 302 - Traffic

§ 302.7 - Licensing; registration of vehicles
§ 302.8 - Transportation of explosives and other dangerous substances
§ 302.9 - Transportation of radioactive materials

Statutory authority: L. 1959, ch. 775, title VIII, art. 38;Public Authorities Law, § 654[5]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
